hey yo man i download i but after i did i wondered how i would read it so my ? is how or wat can i use to read it? thx!

You can use WinRAR to extract the individual pages within the torrent and view them using an image viewing program. Or download a program called CDisplay to view the pages directly.

Thanks, mirrormaster82.
